attributes.action: Give a knighthood to the famous UK classical guitar player Julian Bream.
attributes.background: Julian Alexander Bream,[1] CBE (born 15 July 1933), is an English[2] classical guitarist and lutenist. One of the most distinguished classical guitarists of the 20th century, he played a significant role in improving the public perception of the classical guitar as a respectable instrument.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
